name: GPT-5 Codex
description: GPT-5 Codex is a version of GPT-5 optimized for agentic software engineering and developer workflows. Released in September 2025, it excels at building full projects from scratch, adding features and tests, debugging, performing large-scale refactors, and conducting code reviews.
notes: Trained on complex, real-world engineering tasks. Adapts reasoning time dynamically based on task complexityâ€”faster for small requests, longer for complex refactors. Can work independently for 7+ hours on large tasks. Available via API, GitHub Copilot, and ChatGPT.
